caption.p: Fabrication process of CuHCFe-based microelectrochemical device: ( a) Pt electrode patterning, ( b) photolithography and copper deposition, ( c) formation of CuHCFe thin film by immersing into a K 3Fe(CN) 6 solution, ( d) removing PR by acetone, and ( e) passivation by photolithography. ( f) Optical microscope image of the device. Scale bar: 20 Î¼m.
